column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: gender. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix gender: <http://www.example.org/gender#> .gender:Gender a rdfs:Class .gender:Male a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf gender:Gender .gender:Female a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf gender:Gender .gender:Other a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf gender:Gender .gender:Person a rdfs:Class .gender:hasGender a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain gender:Person ;    rdfs:range gender:Gender .gender:genderIdentity a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain gender:Person ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .
